body: I...don’t exactly like that more than half of all these have to do with literally just rape and manipulation. Whatever happened to just plain old love? ;~;
Coulda added a final page with Haruka...

Why dare Es every manga in this series have to feature Hibari getting directly/indirectly raped by Haruka?  Are the artists really that unimaginative?  There are other situations that would be much better, this cliche is really getting on my nerves...
